name: PaintShop Pro Picture Tube File
summary: Learn about .PSPTUBE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: PaintShop Pro is a raster image editor that provides various tools for creating images and editing digital photos. For example, one of its tools, the picture tube, allows you to add a repeating series of images to an image, such as a trail of dragonflies in a forest or a pattern of seashells on a beach.
PaintShop Pro comes with pre-made picture tubes saved as PSPTUBE files in the following directory:

Also, you can download more picture tube designs from Corel's website or create your own by selecting File → Export → Picture Tube.... You can also select the "Picture Tube Tool" in the toolbar, select the "Preset" icon, then click the "Save preset" option.
NOTE: For an image to be used as a picture tube, it must be 24-bit and only have one raster image with transparency.

instructions: You can open a PSPTUBE file with Corel PaintShop Pro in Windows. You can select the "Picture Tube Tool" in the toolbar, select the "Preset" icon, and click the "File Locations" option. Then, click Add, navigate to the PSPTUBE file in the dialog, choose the PSPTUBE file, and click OK.
You can also import a PSPTUBE file by placing it in the following directory:
The picture tube should then be available in the Picture Tube Tool.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
